name: Note Leap
description:
Mix and Jam 2020 submission

Theme: Mixing Genres

Note Leap is a 2D Platformer combined with rhythmic aspects!

Faded notes cannot be collided with, but darkened ones can. Notes will appear faded until the blue counter is on it. A repeat sign is at the end of the level, sending anything that collides with it back to the beginning. Grab the eraser to get rid of the repeat sign and progress!

Everything made in 2 days by

Phamility, https://twitter.com/TheAgileIndie
